title: IStructuralMemberGroup.MergeArcSegmentBodies
description: Gets or sets whether to merge arc segment bodies with adjacent bodies in this structural-member group.
returns: True to merge arc segment bodies with adjacent bodies, false to not
remarks: This property is valid for curved entities only. The arc segment and adjacent bodies must be tangent to merge.
